parameters: ■あらかじめ読み込んでおくピクチャ
MAPマウスオンと数字がかぶらないようにする為、
ピクチャ順序プラグインの為、
あらかじめピクチャを読み込んでおく
ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
EMW_メッセージウィンドウ指定 4

\c[14]◆Tutorial\c[0] Would you like to hear an explanation
of the picture diary screen?
EMW_メッセージウィンドウ指定 4 終了禁止

In this screen, you can perform end-of-day procedures,
mainly such as \c[14]learning skills\c[0] and \c[14]drawing
a picture diary\c[0], etc..

During the main game, by doing events or naughty things, the
\c[14]Memory Gauge\c[0] at the bottom left gradually fills
up..

The accumulated \c[14]Memory Gauge\c[0] is converted into
\c[14]Skill Points\c[0] on this screen .......

From the \c[14]Skills\c[0] at the bottom of the screen,
\c[14]you can learn various skills..

\c[14]Things that increase the range of pixel H play\c[0]
and \c[14]skills used on the map\c[0], there are various
things you can acquire.

Let's create lots of memories, learn skills, and fully enjoy
this winter as a more fulfilling holiday.

Also, from this work, you can now \c[14]rewrite the picture
diary\c[0].

\c[14]By right-clicking on the latest page\c[0], you can
\c[14]reflect on events\c[0] and \c[14]rewrite it as many
times as you want\c[0]..

\c[14]The actions you took that day become the flags for the
picture diary\c[0], and you cannot depict events that did
not occur.\! Let's try to find a lot of events!

That's the end of the tutorial.\! Now, enjoy your pampered
life (⌒▽⌒)丿
